name: Sublime Package
tagline: Abstract Markup Language syntax highlighting, code snippets, and build system for Sublime Text.
body:
### Installation

#### Abstract Markup Language
RubyGems is required (with Ruby 2.0.0+) to install Abstract Markup Language
```
$ sudo gem install aml
```

#### Sublime Package
You can install the Sublime Abstract Markup Language Package via the [Package Control](http://wbond.net/sublime_packages/package_control) by wbond.

Just type ***aml*** to find and install the package.

### About
Abstract Markup Language is a robust and feature rich markup language designed to avoid repetition and promote clear, well-indented markup.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
